column1: Local Foods////I recently hosted a little lunch here with friends and it was the perfect spot. When you walk in
column2: you will find lots of space and lots of light. I really like the interior of this place
column3: because it doesn't feel crowded. There are plenty of long tables for larger groups and a mix of different types of tables and chairs. The restaurant is counter service
column4: and they have more than one register to keep things moving. Â Their menu isn't huge but it is diverse. When you order
column5: you give them your name. Delivery of food could use some work. Employees wander around looking for someone with that name and it's very inefficient; I hope they change this system (or non-system) soon. I had a benjy's gift card and I was pleased that a manager was able to use it even though it wasn't compatible with their computer system in Local Foods.
